news.title: Jane Remover Shares “Dreamflasher” Video and New Song Featuring Lucy Bedroque: Watch
news.summary: The visual and new single “Audiostalker” arrive ahead of Jane Remover’s tour dates with Turnstile

news.title: Stereolab Release New Songs “Fed Up With Your Job” and “Constant and Uniform Movement Unknown”: Listen
news.summary: The double A-side single is their first music since their May comeback album

news.title: Jeff Tweedy Shares Video for New Song “Lou Reed Was My Babysitter”: Watch
news.summary: A tribute to the late Velvet Underground singer from the new album Twilight Override

news.title: Neil Young Sued by Chrome Hearts Fashion Brand Over New Band’s Name
news.summary: The Los Angeles company is not happy about the existence of Neil Young and the Chrome Hearts

news.title: Mobb Deep Announce New Album Infinite, Share New Song “Against the World”: Listen
news.summary: The first project from the vaunted hip-hop duo since Prodigy’s death in 2017

news.title: Pink Floyd Announce Wish You Were Here 50th Anniversary Reissue, Share “Welcome to the Machine” Demo: Listen
news.summary: The classic 1975 album dedicated to Syd Barrett will be available in 3xLP, 2xCD, and box set formats

news.title: Listen to Madison Cunningham and Fleet Foxes’ New Song “Wake”
news.summary: Cunningham has also announced a tour in support of new album Ace

news.title: Watch Mac DeMarco Perform “Shining” on Colbert
news.summary: The singer-songwriter brings the Guitar track—and some soothing equine visuals—to late night

news.title: 13 New Albums You Should Listen to Now: Jade, Algernon Cadwallader, Jens Lekman, and More
news.summary: Stream new releases from Jade; Algernon Cadwallader; Jens Lekman; Mark William Lewis; Frost Children; Anysia Kym & Tony Seltzer; El Cousteau; King Princess; Maruja; Rian Treanor & Cara Tolmie; the Hidden Cameras; Liquid Mike; and Verses GT

news.title: LCD Soundsystem Announce 2025 New York Residency
news.summary: James Murphy and the band will return to Knockdown Center in Queens for 12 dates
